CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Recently , indacenodithiophene ( IDT ) with two thiophene rings held in a rigid arrangement via a central phenyl ring has emerged as a promising donor moiety for D-A polymers due to its good solubility and highly planar structures ( Scheme 1 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| indacenodithiophene (IDT) |
| thiophene |
| phenyl |

Note: "indacenodithiophene" and "thiophene" are the material names mentioned in the paragraph. "phenyl" is not a material name, but it is a part of the structure of indacenodithiophene and is mentioned in the context of its chemical structure.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| indacenodithiophene (IDT) |
| thiophene |

The entity "phenyl" is not a material name and does not clearly refer to a material name, therefore it is removed from the list.

The corrected Markdown table presents the two valid material names mentioned in the paragraph: "indacenodithiophene (IDT)" and "thiophene".
